channel.title: Maxwell Cofie
channel.description: Thoughts on technology, design, and building products in Africa.

item.title: Gas in the Tank, Not Miles on the Road: The Fundraising Fallacy
item.description: We celebrate the fuel, but ignore the mileage. Why fundraising is not the finish line.

item.title: Your Website, Your Brand, Our Ticketing: Introducing the GatePass Widget
item.description: Embed the GatePass ticketing flow directly into your custom website. Our new widget adapts seamlessly to your design, keeping your brand experience front and center.

item.title: The Reality of Renting in Ghana: Law vs. Practice
item.description: Analyzing Ghana's rental crisis and why government schemes fall short. The new RentBase vision: agent verification and secure deposit protection.

item.title: On Being Useful: Planting Seeds for Innovation
item.description: Reflecting on usefulness as the driver of legacy. How a casual conversation planted the seed for a new venture, and why problems are the raw material of innovation.

item.title: Wrapped, Reflection, and the Art of Intentional Product Design
item.description: An exploration of the “Wrapped” phenomenon and the product thinking behind turning user data into stories that actually matter.

item.title: GatePass: The TikTok for Modern-Day Events
item.description: A reflection on why experience, energy, and short-form video now play a central role in how people discover and choose events.

item.title: My Journey to the West: Ivory Coast Abidjan
item.description: A first-time visit to Abidjan that sparked reflections on language, mobility, mobile money, and the complexities of building and scaling digital products across Africa.

item.title: The Genesis of the Sandbox Réseau
item.description: How a casual meetup led to the birth of a builder community.
